label: ProtectionMeans
comment: A way to protect something, such as human beings, animals or environment, from getting infected or becoming ill.

datatypeProperties.comment: The indication of whether or not this disease protection means is accepted.
A code specifying a category for this cross-border regulatory procedure, such as the appendices of the CITES Convention.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
An item, expressed as text, for this disease protection means.
A restriction, expressed as text, for this disease protection means.
